answers.answer: I hope u gave an easy experience this time! U deserve it! Good luck I hope to hear how y'all are doing. Ill check when I can. Going to get crazy crazy next 2days for us. Ill keep u in my thoughts and prayers.
Good luck hun, I hope all goes well and you have a quick easy delivery this time so you can be home for Christmas!! Congratulations, can't wait to hear how your little boy is doing!
Good luck!!! And congrats! Hope everything goes well and definitely better than your first time!! :) keep us updated!! And I bet your little girl can't wait to meet her baby sibling!!!
Good luck and hope all goes well get some rest! & quick question i also have gestational diabetes so does that mean I might get induced??? :)???

Thanks all. It's hard as she's going through seperation.anxiety and cries for me when I leave the room saying "mumma" :( she's 17 months AMD very aware if I am.not.there..bless her. And it depends. You could be induced early if baby is growing too big or your sugars are out of.control. and here if you haveny gone .naturally they induce you on your due date. I wish I could.go overdue.. would rather that than being induced again..being induced isn't all its cracked out to be..but oh well its best for baby if he's out sooner.. just hope it doesnt take days and days.. my cervix wasn't very favorable a few days ago.so might take a while..
Good luck...everything will turn out fine!  Your daughter will also be fine...you will probably be feeling more hurt than she is.

question: In 7 hours ill be going in to be induced. Due date tomorrow and I have gestational diabetes hense the induction.. I'm nervous/anxious as hell as I had an awful induction experience with my daughter and it took.three days. She was then ill after being born.and in.special care with a bad infection. Plus I.hope it doesn't take that long this time as I would ideally like.to be home.on.Xmas with my little.girl , partner and baby. Also.anxious to be apart from my daughter as I'm a stay at home mum and with her 24/7 .. going to miss her loads! Well wish Mr luck..will update when I.can if I can get signal.on.the ward. Take care all! I'm so scared :'( and worried.how much ill miss my girl.
title: so its finally.time!
